title: BRAND NEW - Jr 1 BEDROOM - PRIVATE PATIO!
posting_body: Fantastic studio apartment in a brand new building, lots of bult in storage, efficient open floorplan with modern design and functional features.

Modern construction and QuietRock combine to create a tranquil and calm interior, and all the excitement and energy of San Francisco just outside your front door, this is the perfect place to call home.
With your own sunny private patio that looks out over quaint Clementina Street, you'll have the ultimate space to decompress and enjoy the warm SOMA weather.
Priced competitively this won’t last long, call today!
OME is a new boutique SOMA community, offering modern design features and an open-style layout, clean and green, highly efficient apartments combine to create the best apartments in San Francisco.
